message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave you 10%.  We can negotiate from there.
Alice, your offer was a bit lopsided.  I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Consider that the money loses value for me with every round.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's split it 60/40.  Remember, the value of the money is decreasing for both of us with each round.
